scenario_text.value: Help! Somebody help, please!
Huh? I thought I heard a voice just now!

You don’t think it’s that Arukenimon again,
do you?

No, they were calling for help. I thought
I heard it coming from around here...

Well, if it’s help they’re after, it’s help
they’ll get!

Wait! You don’t even know who it is! What if
they want to take advantage of us?
Aw, don’t be like that. We should help them.
Shut up! Nobody asked you!

What if we made them agree not to attack us
in exchange for our help?

Yeah, but don’t stop there! We could tell
them to give us all their food, too!
That might as well be robbery.
Hey, I found him!
Help!
It’s Tentomon! No need to worry about him!
The poor thing’s caught in a spiderweb.
(So, what do we do about him?)
We help, of course.
Let’s leave him be.
Depends on what we get.
Help.

We should get him out of there. Agumon, think
you can cut through those threads?
No problem!
Don’t help.

I don’t see any reason to help. Let’s just
go.

Wait, if he’s not going to attack us, we
could ask for information.
Isn’t that a good reason to help?
I guess... Agumon, get him out of there.
You got it!
Help conditionally.

We should try to get something out of this.
Food would be good, but does he have any?

Maybe we could ask if he knows what happened
to Miu.

Oh, good idea. Agumon, can you get him out of
there?
You got it!

Oh, I’m saved! Thank you so much for helping
me.

Hm...? Well, would you look at that. More
human children! How unusual.
More? Wait, you mean you’ve seen others?!

Right you are. And a lot smaller than the one
behind you!

Could that have been Miu?! Was she walking
around by herself?

Well, she’d been captured by that terrifying
Arukenimon, you see.

I couldn’t help but take pity on the girl, so
I rescued her at the first opportunity.

Unfortunately, I was then discovered by
Arukenimon and taken prisoner myself, haha.

But what about Miu? What happened to the
girl?!

The girl? Why, she ran away. I was right
behind her, so there’s no doubt about that.
She was headed to that shiny place, you see.

Okay, great. Thanks for telling me. And for
rescuing Miu in the first place.
Oh, my. Don’t even mention it!
So, where exactly is this...shiny place?

I’m...not sure how to describe it. Why not
climb up somewhere and see for yourselves?

Hey, you think we’d be able to see it from
the top of that tower?
Good thinking. Let’s go up and find out.
